title: Ricard Pastis
content:
Would love help identifying the font used for the “Pastis de Marseilles” section of this label.

Thanks so much!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Pastis\_Ricard\_Bottle.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522121645/http:/typophile.com/files/Pastis_Ricard_Bottle.jpg) | 964.38 KB |
author: brendanmcguigan

comments.content:
I think that is [Oxalis Alternate](http://web.archive.org/web/20090522121645/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/oxalis/) by Franck Jalleau. It’s a font I use a lot.

- Mike Yanega

Hmm.

The majuscule R doesn’t quite have the sweep I like in the label, but it is awfully close. Maybe it is the same, and I’m just missing it.

Thanks so much for your help!
